thread.title: Best Hotel Team in Paris
thread.title_full: Best Hotel Team in Paris - Review of Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: chanonki
title: Best Hotel Team in Paris
text: All the staff in this hotel is amazingly helpful! ALL OF THEM! they are the nicest and lovely team I have ever met! I stayed in lot of hotels in the world , this one impress me the most. The team give you a very warm and welcoming stay that you can feel that you are staying home! thanks Laurent, Nirosha, Julie, Amaury, Davy for everything!
